 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָנַף‎</span>] **verb** ==wrap, or wind up, together== (compare Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***hem*** of garment, <lookup onclick="bdbabb('Tg')"><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ᵑ7‎</span><sup>**J**</sup></lookup> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְנָפָא‎</span> ***skirt*** ( = <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎כָּנָף‎</span>); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מַצְנֵפָא‎</span> ***turban***, Christian-Palestinian Aramaic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***tassel***); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִצְנֹף‎</span> [[Lev.16.4|Lev 16:4]] ***he shall wind*** (his head) with (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ב‎</span>) the turban ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִצְנֶפֶת‎</span> q. v.); suffix, + ***Infinitive absolute*** and accusative of congnate meaning with verb <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צָנוֺף יִצְנָפְךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צְנֵפָה‎</span> [[Isa.22.18|Isa 22:18]] ***he will wind thee entirely up*** (with) ***a winding*** (under figure of ball, to be driven far off, in exile). — <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎צנוף‎</span> [[Isa.62.3|Isa 62:3]] see following.
